page.title: 18EDUCATION
page.content:
SCHOOL. TANG HALL PUPIL. I go to junior school. I like school. We do lots of exciting things like pottery and science. I play soccer for the team but we are not very good. My teenage brother doesn't like school but my fifteen year old sister says its alright.
SCHOOL PLAYTIME. SAMUEL MAZLOUM. 10. At school I usually play football but don't play the normal rules because there aren't enough of us. We have no tackling in the area and no offside rules. We older ones usually play against the second and third year juniors. I play for the school team at Joseph Rowntree comprehensive school in six a side tournaments. Here the goals are four feet high and ten feet wide.
